EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Pending Time (1338580057.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Pending Time (1338580057.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Murali, I called 703-628-5661 twice and each time the line was crossed to another person that said I had the wrong number. Would you mind calling me? In the meantime your time has been approved an it invoiced this afternoon since it was the end of the month. The email below is only an automatic notification from our system to let you know you had time that was still not approved. I had not approved it yet because it was not the end of the month so you can disregard. Please give me a ring. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Murali Raju [mailto:murali.raju@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, June 01, 2012 1:06 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Pending Time Could you call me when you have few mins?
Thanks, Murali.On Fri, Jun 1, 2012 at 6:58 AM, <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:You have pending time in your business center. You might want to check to make sure you have provided all the required documentation for approval of your time.
If you have questions you can contact Sara Conde at 703-793-6028 <tel:703-793-6028> or email sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>
This is a system generated email that you have requested by selecting it on the System Notification page.
***Do not reply to this email. If you have questions regarding the content of this notification please contact your Business Manager directly.***
